title: TGIF

description.plain: “TGIF” (which actually means “Thank Glo It’s Friday” and not “Thank God It’s Friday”, which is the usual spelling for this acronym/saying) was originally previewed on May 17th, 2024 via a snippet of her with friends during a tour stop. This song seemingly uses the exact same or a sampled the beat used by rapper KOTO. on their song “so silly !”

embed_content: Read “TGIF” by GloRilla on Genius

body.plain: “TGIF” (which actually means “Thank Glo It’s Friday” and not “Thank God It’s Friday”, which is the usual spelling for this acronym/saying) was originally previewed on May 17th, 2024 via a snippet of her with friends during a tour stop. This song seemingly uses the exact same or a sampled the beat used by rapper KOTO. on their song “so silly !”
